meanings.definition: The quality or state of being visually attractive or pleasing.
meanings.sent1: The sightlinesses of the garden brought joy to all who visited.
meanings.sent2: The sightlinesses of the painting captivated the viewers.
meanings.sent3: The sightlinesses of the clown's outfit made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sightlinesses of the sunset painted the sky in hues of gold and pink.
meanings.sent5: The sightlinesses of the flowers in full bloom were a feast for the eyes.

meanings.definition: The appearance or visual appeal of something.

meanings.sent2: The sightlinesses of the dress caught everyone's attention at the party.
